name: Spitfire Command (Robot Werewolf)
description:
CONTROLS:
W,A,S,D = Movement
R = Primary Fire
T = Secondary Fire
F = Ultimate Ability

GUIDE:
Piloting a ship of your choice (information on each ship shown below), your style of play will change. Various enemies will try to attack you, some more threatening than others and with varying amounts of health. The boss at the end of the Asteroid Field can only be defeated after destroying all of its cannons. Also, to gain access to your ship's ultimate ability, collect the glowing blue capsules floating through the map.

SPITFIRE:
Shield = 5
Speed = 10
R = Dual Beam
T = Missile
F = Corvette Bombing Run

LAPWING:
Shield = 3
Speed = 12
R = Standard Beam
T = Charge Beam
F = Heavy Bomb

VULCAN:
Shield = 6
Speed = 6
R = Standard Beam
T = Bomb
F = Ion Pulse (Slows enemies, doesn't affect bosses)

METEOR:
Shield = 4
Speed = 8
R = Standard Beam
T = Rear Turret
F = Beam Cannon
